hey skweeky,

I used the tool and it helped a lot... I had yes a few problems when building.

1) Add "RequestContext requestContext" to IController GetControllerInstance(RequestContext requestContext, Type controllerType)

file \Oxite\Oxite.Mvc\Infrastructure\OxiteControllerFactory.cs

2) Add ".ToString()" for the htmlHelper.*() errors.

a bunch of files

3) normal procedure:

Add dlls

  • BlogML 2.0 (BlogML.dll)
  • xunit-1.5 (xunit.dll, xunit.extensions.dll)

Install

  • AntiXSSV31.msi
  • Unity Application Block 1.2.msi

 

Thanks a lot man!!
